entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sprague 1:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -19.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 53 %

Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
